title: Cardinals-Giants Preview Capsule
text:
ARIZONA (2-3-1) at NY GIANTS (2-4)

Sunday, 1 p.m. ET, FOX

OPENING LINE - Giants by 3

RECORD VS. SPREAD - Arizona 4-2; Giants 2-4

SERIES RECORD - Giants lead 80-44-2

LAST MEETING - Cardinals beat Giants 23-0, Dec. 24, 2017

LAST WEEK - Cardinals beat Falcons 34-33; Giants lost to Patriots 35-14

AP PRO32 RANKING - Cardinals No. 24, Giants No. 26

CARDINALS OFFENSE - OVERALL (9), RUSH (12), PASS (11).

CARDINALS DEFENSE - OVERALL (30), RUSH (26), PASS (30).

GIANTS OFFENSE - OVERALL (24), RUSH (18), PASS (18).

GIANTS DEFENSE - OVERALL (28), RUSH (24), PASS (31).

STREAKS, STATS AND NOTES - Cardinals won last two meetings. … Arizona LBs Chandler Jones and Terrell Suggs have combined 8½ sacks and six forced fumbles. … QB Kyler Murray’s 128.2 passer rating against Falcons last weekend was highest for rookie this season. … Arizona had league’s last-place offense last season in total yards. It ranks ninth this season. … Arizona has allowed 21 sacks, 6th-highest total in league. … Arizona has four turnovers, tied with Chicago and Tennessee for NFL’s lowest total. LB Jordan Hicks tied for league lead with 62 tackles. … K Zane Gonzalez leads NFL with 58 points. … Giants lost two in a row. … QB Daniel Jones 2-2 since replacing Eli Manning. … RB Saquon Barkley has 100-plus yards from scrimmage in 15 of 19 career games. … WR Golden Tate has 18 catches for 181 yards in last two against Arizona. … Evan Engram ranks second in receiving yards (373) and tied for second in catches (33) among NFC TEs. … LB Markus Golden had first career TD on 42-yard fumble return against Patriots. Had 19 sacks and six forced fumbles in four seasons (2015-18) with Arizona. … LBs Alec Ogletree and David Mayo each had 12 tackles against New England. … CB Janoris Jenkins has three interceptions, tied for second in NFL. …. Pro Bowl PK Aldrick Rosas has attempted five FGs (made four) in six games. … Fantasy Tip: If Barkley plays, take him. He has been chomping to get back and if he does, it is against one of league’s worst defenses. He’s averaging 133.2 yards rushing in nine career home games.

___
